name: Slimer (Lumbo)
description:
Stop enemies getting to the bottom.

Kill as many enemies as possible.

The mechanics of this game are based off the rolls of the dice.

- Time until next wave (top left)

- Amount of shotgun ammo on next reload (top right)

- Type and number of enemies (middle, top row)

- Enemy spawn location (middle bottom row)

Enemy type and location dice can combo to create a swarm of enemies at the combo-ed location.

Controls:

Move: A, D

Jump: W / Space

Shoot: Left / Right Click
